mods.abstract: WLW (Cincinnati, OH) radio program Time To Shine, originally broadcast February 23, 1944 (part 2). Featuring the Buccaneers including Captain Stubby (Tom C. Fouts), Dwight E. "Tiny" Stokes, and Buddy Ross; Grandpappy Doolittle; and Dolly Good; with announcer Cecil (last name unknown), and host Jimmy Leonard.

subject.topic: Captain Stubby and the Buccaneers (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
